column14: Processing of the MSH segment results in the creation of a new Bundle resource.
MSH-10 and MSH-9 are mapped to Patient.meta.tag for message tracking.
Event segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Processing of the PID segment results in the creation of a new Patient resource.
PID-2.1 maps to Patient.id for PUT request URL.
PID-2, PID-3, PID-19 map to Patient.identifier array.
PID-3.4.1 (MR assigning authority) maps to sender tag.
Patient Visit segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Next of Kin segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Disability segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Observation segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Allergy segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Diagnosis segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Procedures segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Guarantor segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
Insurance segment not mapped in simplified implementation.
